comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: William Gervase Vizard OBE. Born 26 Aug 1895 (death index) in Surbiton, Surrey (1901 census). Died 10 May 1984 according to The Times Obituary published on 14 May 1984. Living at Bayfield, Surbiton, Surrey in 1901 aged 5 with his 9yr old sister Margaret Marian and parents Herbert, a 51yr old Solictor and 45yr old Margaret Emma. They employed a Parlour Maid, a Nurse and a Cook. At the time of the 1911 census William had spent the night in the School Sanitorium at Charterhouse www.charterhouse.org.uk/ Peperharow Road, Godalming. His Medal Roll Index Card shows that he was of Whitepost House, Redhill, Surrey 12/10/1920. The London Gazette reports his OBE was given in 1968 www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/44600/supplements/6311/pa... when he was 'lately Chairman of the Swindon National Insurance Tribunal'.
